Change Log
==========

1.0.0 (28/07/2022)
------------------
- Stable version.
- Bug fixes.

0.3.0 (27/07/2022)
------------------
- Supports .xlsx, .json, .txt, .csv, .xml, .pkl, .docx files.

0.2.0 (26/07/2022)
------------------
- CeVeri now measures the execution time of the translation.
- Bug fixes.
- Supports .xlsx, .json, .txt, .csv, .xml files.

0.1.0 (25/07/2022)
------------------
- First release.
- Trial version.
- Supports .xlsx, .json, and .txt files.
